price: Tena tutawasimulia kwa ilimu; wala Sisi hatukuwa mbali .
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ
footnotes: Na tutawapa wote khabari ya kweli yote yaliyo kuwa kwao, kwa sababu hakika Sisi tumewadhibitia kila kitu chao, kwani Sisi hatukuwa mbali nao, wala hatukuwa hatujui waliyo kuwa wakiyafanya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
